"wir sollten unsere personenbezogenen daten sch체tzen wie unsere wichtigsten sch채tze. datenschutz ist keine luxusfrage, sondern ein grundrecht. jede andere firma & regierung sollte anonymes sammeln und verwenden von daten verhindern. #datenschutz #privatsph채re #rechte"

translation: "we should protect our personal data like our most valuable treasures. data privacy is not a luxury question, but a fundamental right. every other company and government should prevent the anonymous collection and use of data."

in this post, i'm expressing my opinion on the importance of protecting personal information and data privacy. i believe that individuals have the right to control their own data and that companies and governments should not be able to collect and use it without consent. this is a critical issue in today's digital age, as more and more personal information is being collected, stored, and shared online. it's important for individuals to be aware of this issue and to take action to protect their privacy. #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsph채re (private sphere) are popular hashtags in germany that people use to discuss this topic on social media.
